      • setRegisterShutdownHook

        public AzkarraContext setRegisterShutdownHook​(boolean registerShutdownHook)
        Sets if the created AzkarraContext should have a shutdown hook registered. Defaults to true to ensure that JVM shutdowns are handled gracefully.
        Specified by:
        setRegisterShutdownHook in interface AzkarraContext
        Parameters:

        Returns:
